article_title: Chief Justice Roberts’ record isn’t conservative enough for some activists
article_text:
Roberts voted with conservatives on five of six major rulings earlier this year

But his vote in support of the Affordable Care Act angered the right wing

Having just turned 60 this year, Roberts is not going away any time soon

article_metadata.title: Chief Justice Roberts’ record isn’t conservative enough for some activists | The Herald

og.description: When a divided Supreme Court handed down six major rulings in the last week of June, Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. came down firmly on the conservative side in five of them.
